verses.text: Answer me when I call, God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness. Give me relief from \w my|strong="H1732"\w* distress. \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5329"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w You|strong="H7121"\w* sons \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w*, \w how|strong="H8085"\w* \w long|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H6664"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* glory \w be|strong="H2603"\w* turned into dishonour? \w Will|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* love vanity \w and|strong="H6030"\w* seek \w after|strong="H7121"\w* falsehood? \qs Selah.\qs*

\w But|strong="H4100"\w* know \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w set|strong="H1245"\w* apart \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w himself|strong="H1245"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* godly; \w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hear \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* call \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w*.

Stand \w in|strong="H3068"\w* awe, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* don’t sin. Search \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*
Offer \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness. Put \w your|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Many say, “\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* show us any good?” \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* light \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face shine \w on|strong="H3068"\w* us.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* gladness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* new wine \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w increased|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5414"\w* peace \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* both \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1715"\w* sleep, \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* alone, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* live \w in|strong="H5414"\w* safety.
